text:
@BarackObama Dear Barak Obama , what do you think of Trump's attempt on preventing Covid19 on himself by taking malaria tablets for a week now apparently 🤣🤣🤣🤭🤭🤭 even the 3rd World is laughing at him 😁🤣...
With a bit of luck he will never have to take one more tablet 🤣🤞what an idiot
